column1: Little Goat Diner////This is one of my favorite restaurants in the world.  Consistently above the bar
column4: and subtle when it needs to be. Cheap
column5: with solid cocktails. You can expect things to be delicious
column6: yet different.  I tried This little piggy went to China and the pork belly pancake
column7: but I'd bet that the menu changes by the time you visit.  No matter
